1.title: The Curious Case of Mouth Eyes

2.title: Hot Pepper
2.plot: Josh eats an extremely spicy pepper.

3.plot: Olan, Josh, and Thomas show each other how they like to eat their Oreos.

4.title: Teleport
4.plot: Josh learns how to teleport, albeit imperfectly.

5.plot: The forgetful president of a drug company tries to shoot an advert for his memory-improving medicine.

6.plot: Three friends celebrate America's birthday together.

7.title: Pump It Up! Burn It Up! Dance Contest
7.plot: Josh, Olan, and Thomas practice their moves in preparation for a dance contest.

8.plot: Josh discovers a mysterious entity in his attic and attempts to communicate with it.

9.plot: Olan shows Josh his new gadget, the Falcon X, which may or may not be Thomas wrapped in tinfoil.

10.title: I'm Enjoying a Treat, Derrick!
10.plot: Derrick once again annoys Alex past his breaking point.

11.plot: The origin of the Great Chancho is revealed, as is his follow-up battle with Señor Artés.

12.title: Whips
12.plot: Three men duel each other with whips.

13.plot: Josh raves to Olan and Thomas about the latest Matthew McConaughey flick, "Ghost of Girlfriends Past."

14.plot: Two men gather info on the new Twilight film from their team of spies.

15.title: Sneezey Peezey

16.plot: A pair of detectives investigate a crime scene and interrogate a shady witness.

17.title: Cahoots
17.plot: A kidnapper attempts to exchange a man's brother for a ransom.

18.plot: A stranger elicits outrage in a pair of friends by spilling one of their drinks onto the other.

1.title: Not Right Now, Derrick
1.plot: Derrick chooses to repeatedly annoy Alex despite Alex's being preoccupied.

2.plot: Two men treat themselves to a refreshing pair of Mountain Dew sodas with unexpectedly disastrous results.

3.plot: Two runners, one of them very rotund, have an exchange.

4.plot: Dan Brackens, 1991 Worthington Dart Champion, shows the benefits of drinking Dart Juice.

5.plot: Four friends try to discover which of them is guilty of surreptitiously eating a Snack Pack.

6.plot: Three U.S. soldiers prepare for an attack on Lake Ponch.

8.plot: Professional karate instructor Clint Swift advertises for his new DVD collection set, "Danger Tactics."

9.plot: A two-man band answers a flyer from a failing record company in the hopes of landing a record deal.

10.plot: Nicholas Brahan, host of "Brahan's Books," interviews author Stephen Brilloo about his latest publication.

11.plot: Alex bothers Derrick while he's busy trying to listen to his radio.

12.plot: A Halo gamer loses his win streak when his friend upsets his ritualized gaming methods.

14.plot: A man with a new scarf asks his friend what he thinks of it.

16.plot: A man upsets his friend's plans by playing Halo 3 to the point of delusion.

17.plot: Two friends reunite and take their handshake to the next level.

18.plot: Alex Bernstein advertises for his diet pills.

19.plot: Vigilante Dick Murphree hunts for the man who killed his wife.

22.plot: A young man attempts to court a girl with an overbearing boyfriend.
